Proclamations. 1690-07-19.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb, printers to the King and Queens most Excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at Our court at Whitehall the nineteenth day of July, 1690. in the second year of Our reign. God save King William and Queen Mary.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
